pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://raw.github.com/emsig/logos/main/empymod/empymod-logo.png :target: https://emsig.xyz :alt: empymod logoOpen-source full 3D electromagnetic modeller for 1D VTI media- **Website:** https://emsig.xyz- **Documentation:** https://empymod.emsig.xyz- **Source Code:** https://github.com/emsig/empymod- **Bug reports:** https://github.com/emsig/empymod/issues- **Contributing:** https://empymod.emsig.xyz/en/latest/dev- **Contact:** see https://emsig.xyz- **Zenodo:** https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.593094Available through ``conda`` and ``pip``; consult the `documentation<https://empymod.emsig.xyz>`_ for detailed installation instructions.
